DOC.criteria: Male female , 18 70 year old Subject willing able give write informed consent . Subject commit undergo abdominoplasty procedure independent study . Subject willing able comply study instruction commit visit duration study . Subject good general health free disease state physical condition might impair evaluation investigator 's opinion , expose subject unacceptable risk study participation . Subject currently enrol investigational drug device study specifically target abdominal area . Subject currently smoke . Subject clot disorder and/or use anticoagulant ( e.g. , warfarin , clopidogrel , etc . ) within seven ( 7 ) day prior administration device . Subject use oral inhaled steroid last 14 day and/or chronic user inhale oral steroid past investigator feel subject may compromise wind heal . Subject use topical steroid abdominal area within last 30 day . Subject systemic immunosuppressive therapy . Subject prior surgery and/or treatment alters subcutaneous anatomy target treatment site : liposuction , cryolipolysis , highintensity focus ultrasound . History abdominal hernia . Subject follow condition : Allergy intolerance lidocaine , Other local skin condition ( e.g. , skin infection ) target treatment site , Any physical psychiatric condition investigator 's opinion would prevent adequate study participation . Chronic medical condition use medication investigator 's opinion would affect study participation wound heal ( diabetes , hepatitis , HIV , etc. ) .
